config.name: Fast Momentum Trading
config.description: Quick momentum captures with reduced noise

config.name: Long-Term Swing Trading
config.description: Major trend captures with lower frequency

risk_considerations: Can be affected by overnight news

1m.risk_level: High - requires fast execution and tight risk management

30m.risk_level: Low - higher reliability but fewer signals

implementation_guidelines.risk_management: Always use ATR-based stops regardless of timeframe
implementation_guidelines.position_sizing: Reduce size by 50% for 1m, 25% for 5m vs 15m
implementation_guidelines.monitoring: 1m and 5m require constant monitoring, 15m-30m can be part-time
